comments.commentBody: I hope they ask Mrs. Clinton real questions that she will grace to answer live in front of the American Public. This article has Mrs. Clinton planning to needle Mr. Trump, and to deflect any concrete platform and answer the important questions about policy and planning for the 21st century.

Christie:  What pay for play scheme has benefited Russia?  Hillary is anti-coal and for highly regulated fracking because they both are killing the planet.  If you think that the Russians didn't hack the DNC, you are ignoring all the evidence.  And it must be a coincidence that Clinton's former campaign manager, Paul Manafort, has made millions representing Putin puppets.  We need to see Don the Con's tax returns to see what his ties to Russia really are.  We know that he was cozy with the mob in his NY business.  Does he also owe the Russian mafia money?  And talk about deflection.  If you look at all of Don the Con's attacks on Hillary, the one thing they have in common are that he accuses her of that which he does and has done.
It's the "Democratic ticket" not "Democrat ticket."
Well, we need to do single payer and get rid of the insurance companies.
Let's finally see what BOTH Mr. Trump and Mrs. Clinton have to say live and in front of the American audience!

You realize San Francisco, Los Angeles, Houston,  Dallas, Austin, Atlanta, and Denver are all run by Democrats and those cities have some of the highest economic growth in the land. Republicans have run Mississippi for 25 years and it's still the poorest state in the country. So what's your point?

Perhaps a law mandating that all dead bodies should be cremated is necessary in order to put a stop to this madness. In an electric crematorium, of course. Save valuable land, money, and the environment...
Or, indeed, bags, backpacks, cool boxes and in general any largish, non-transparent container.

Can we separate the cemetery issue from the zoning/permit issue.  First, as a Catholic, it has been very important for members of my family to be buried in a Catholic cemetery.  So I have no problem with separate Catholic, Jewish or Muslim cemeteries.  It's freedom of religious expression.  However, if a municipality has right of first refusal, or if land is intended to be preserved as farmland or as undeveloped property, then those who would want to buy the land are often faced with all sorts of red tape. I think there is more to this story.

Muslims seeking the same rights as any other religious group should not solely bear the burden of any meta concern of  human burials and that burials should be integrated among religions.  By the way Honeybee - the land in the question was not in any way "donated" but paid for, and Muslims like Jews do not inject the deceased with "toxic chemicals".

Religious freedom and integration are not mutually exclusive. It is not either or.  I have the right to be buried in a Catholic cemetery according to my religious beliefs if I so choose.  And I believe that Muslims and Jews should have the same choice.  But that doesn't mean we can't all live together as Americans.

Kunta Kinte was brought to America in the 1760's. His people, the Mandinka, practiced their native African religion until forcibly converted to Islam through a series of "holy wars" starting in the 1850's.

Denmark Vessey was a Christian who helped found the African Methodist Episcopal Church.

You would do well not to appropriate African American culture & history to fit your political agenda. African Americans have their own culture be it from Africa or later from the Caribbean. They are not just Muslim and their contribution to this country being counted as Muslim  lcontribution to the United States.

As an American Muslim let me make one thing perfectly clear. When it comes to our rights in this country we, along with Native, African, Asian, and Hispanic Americans are not asking anyone for them- we are taking them. This country was extremely diverse from the moment non-Native Americans from Europe arrived here. Muslims have been hear from the very beginning of these waves of non Native immigration, by some estimates a third of African American slaves were of Muslim origin from Kunte Kinte to Denmark Vessey. So unless you are a Native American with clear tribal descent, let us make one thing perfectly clear Bubba, if this diversity, which has always existed in this land makes you uncomfortable, go back to where your non Native American ancestors came from.

Finally someone who wants to hear issues from Hillary and hopefully solutions and a platform to present to the US public.

Let Mr. Trump keep to his strategy and be shown for what we already know he is!

We have many Christian cemeteries in the US, followed by Jewish cemeteries, which is why you and I never actually think about having to find a place to bury our loved ones. If you had to search all over, forced in to traveling 60 miles to find nearest one to you wouldn't you want one closer? It's a changing world and country, we are a nation of emigrants, and as such need to be more open to the needs of all citizens, not just those of European descent.
Because unlike some their religious Holy Days mean something besides a day off and time to get drunk for 3 days.

But, ok to sell cars?
I'd like to see Chik-fil-a have to be open on Sunday's. They say it's out of respect for the owner's Christianity. But, when we had the Great Recession and there were people not Christian and well as Chistian who would have cried for a job to make money to buy food for their family, they would have gladly worked Sundays. But, no everyone had to 'respect' the owners religion. I haven't eaten there since and will not. As I stay away from Hobby Lobby for the same thing. Attempting to force us to obey their man made religious laws.

So, what your family will do when you die is CELEBRATE! BBQ maybe? Yelling, hard rock music?
We are talking celebrate in the sense of prayer services and being together as a family. What better observance of 9/11 is there?

You mean the celebration that Trump swears that he saw on TV, but no TV station has archival footage of it?  If you mean the 9/11/2016, that one is just a coincidence.  By the way, Muslims never do street carnivals on that occasion!

Because she's "ducking the issues". There was an article in either yesterday or today's paper informing us that Mrs. Clinton travels with 2 planes all the time. ONe is for her and her entourage, while the other is for the press. Now how then can they even ask her questions when she keeps in her cocoon?

Honestly said!  Humanity needs to shed such evil myths as fathers murdering their sons to please a god and to stand erect as thinking and free beings.  No amount of celebratory self-flagellation will erase he reality of 9/11.
Lise, if you are a woman in America you are in more danger of being shot to death by your husband/boyfriend/ex than you are being killed by a religious extremist.
Although your religion means nothing to me, you have your right to a holiday.  We shouldn't have to pretend that 9/ll wasn't about religion, however.

@tawanda7:"Apparently, you do not understand the history of the Middle East."
As I said it was the beginning of the end of Ottoman expansion into Europe.

Thumbs up does indicate that some people agree with you. Random people agreeing with you is not the same as evidence. A conspiracy theory does not become true because people believe in it. Something false doesn't become true because lots of people "like" it on Facebook. Not good ways to investigate the accuracy of an assertion.
Yup: Jewish holidays too.
